articles.content: Selectors announced Australian Test squad for the upcoming South Africa Series on Wednesday and retained under-fire Tim Paine as the captain. National selector Trevor Hohns after the announcement of … [+2434 chars]

articles.title: Juventus vs. SPAL - Football Match Report - January 28, 2021 - ESPN India
articles.description: Get a report of the Juventus vs. SPAL 2020-21 Italian Coppa Italia, Quarterfinals football match.
articles.content:
A youthful Juventus side crushed SPAL 4-0 on Wednesday to set up a Coppa Italia semifinal against Inter Milan.
